prompts: Create a flower-themed Pokemon that embodies the spirit of spring and has vibrant colors.
I want a fairy-type Pokemon with delicate petal-like features and an enchanting aura.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a small humanoid with floral accessories and a joyful expression.
Make a cute Pokemon that has a green body and a large, fluffy white flower on its head.
Imagine a Pokemon that radiates happiness and has a flowing design reminiscent of nature's beauty.
Design a whimsical creature that combines elements of flowers and playful personalities.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in gardens and has a magical connection to nature.

distinctive_features: Large, fluffy flower on the head
